page.title: 19Industry - Yardley B4
page.content: Twenty questionairs were distributed to Garretts Green Industrial Estate and twelve were returned.Generally the firms were quite small, only two employing more than one hundred people and the rest employing fewer than forty. Seven firms were expanding and only two have made employees redundant in the last twelve months, which is against the current trend of regression. Industry on the estate is very diverse; 9 firms are manufacturing and 3 are service industries, but by walking round the estate we saw firms making concrete, windows and ice-cream and offering services like dairy deliveries. One firm on the estate employs mainly handicapped people, but it, like many of the others, has a widespread market. Firms export to all 5 continents and deal with e.g. China & Saudi Arabia.7 firms hope to expand.
